If \\( f(z) \\) is applied to a complex number \\( z_0 \\) at t = 0, and then allowed to evolve under \\( \\frac{dz}{dt} = Mz + N \\) without any other intervention, will the resulting \\( z(t) \\) at t = T differ from what would occur if \\( z_0 \\) was evolved directly under \\( \\frac{dz}{dt} = Mz + N \\)?
